Class: QRCode

QRCode

new QRCode(el, vOption)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
el HTMLElement | String target element or 'id' attribute of element.
vOption Object | String
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
text String QRCode link data
width Number <optional>
 256
height Number <optional>
 256
colorDark String <optional>
 "#000000"
colorLight String <optional>
 "#ffffff"
correctLevel QRCode.CorrectLevel <optional>
 QRCode.CorrectLevel.H [L|M|Q|H]
Examples
new QRCode(document.getElementById("test"), "http://jindo.dev.naver.com/collie");
var oQRCode = new QRCode("test", {
   text : "http://naver.com",
   width : 128,
   height : 128
});

oQRCode.clear(); // Clear the QRCode.
oQRCode.makeCode("http://map.naver.com"); // Re-create the QRCode.

Members

<static> CorrectLevel
